about_the_game:
Food Truck Time Machine is a Virtual Reality game that seamlessly blends time travel with the art of cooking. With its memorable visuals, immersive gameplay, and an expansive menu of recipes from diverse eras, this epic culinary adventure will leave you hungry for more. So, rev up the engines of your food truck and embark on an unforgettable voyage through time, savouring the flavours of the past, present, and future!


  • 5 time zones and 20 different recipes to master
  • Cook food on a hotplate, microwave, deep fryer, coffee machine and slushie-maker
  • Each time zone has recipes from that era to cook
  • Customers pay with everyday items, you then blend the items to fuel the time circuits. When the circuits reach zero you can travel through time!
  • Extremely accurate physics feel just like the real cooking
  • Comfortable and Smooth locomotion supported
Can you cook your way home?

Future game roadmap includes 5 new minigames in each timezone

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better.
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: Oculus PC

short_description: Imagine if you were in a food truck that could travel through time! Your journey will span over 2 millennium with 5 different time periods each with its own set of customers and food. You are the time travelling food chef but can you cook your way home!
